derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting a sledge): perhaps from Old English dræge 'dragnet', related to dragan 'to pull' (see draw)

entry.tran: 四轮运货大马车;马拉板车
entry.def: A dray is a large flat cart with four wheels which is pulled by horses.

means.word_mean: 1. a low heavy horse cart without sides; used for haulage
